00038 #define DDR(x) (*(&x - 1))      /* address of data direction register of port x */
00039 #if defined(__AVR_ATmega64__) || defined(__AVR_ATmega128__)
00040     /* on ATmega64/128 PINF is on port 0x00 and not 0x60 */
00041     #define PIN(x) ( &PORTF==&(x) ? _SFR_IO8(0x00) : (*(&x - 2)) )
00042 #else
00043     #define PIN(x) (*(&x - 2))    /* address of input register of port x          */
00044 #endif

00047 #if LCD_IO_MODE
00048 #define lcd_e_delay()   __asm__ __volatile__( "rjmp 1f\n 1:" );
00049 #define lcd_e_high()    LCD_E_PORT  |=  _BV(LCD_E_PIN);
00050 #define lcd_e_low()     LCD_E_PORT  &= ~_BV(LCD_E_PIN);
00051 #define lcd_e_toggle()  toggle_e()
00052 #define lcd_rw_high()   LCD_RW_PORT |=  _BV(LCD_RW_PIN)
00053 #define lcd_rw_low()    LCD_RW_PORT &= ~_BV(LCD_RW_PIN)
00054 #define lcd_rs_high()   LCD_RS_PORT |=  _BV(LCD_RS_PIN)
00055 #define lcd_rs_low()    LCD_RS_PORT &= ~_BV(LCD_RS_PIN)
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 #if LCD_IO_MODE
00059 #if LCD_LINES==1
00060 #define LCD_FUNCTION_DEFAULT    LCD_FUNCTION_4BIT_1LINE 
00061 #else
00062 #define LCD_FUNCTION_DEFAULT    LCD_FUNCTION_4BIT_2LINES 
00063 #endif
00064 #else
00065 #if LCD_LINES==1
00066 #define LCD_FUNCTION_DEFAULT    LCD_FUNCTION_8BIT_1LINE
00067 #else
00068 #define LCD_FUNCTION_DEFAULT    LCD_FUNCTION_8BIT_2LINES
00069 #endif
00070 #endif

00075 #define KS0073_EXTENDED_FUNCTION_REGISTER_ON  0x24   /* |0|010|0100 4-bit mode extension-bit RE = 1 */
00076 #define KS0073_EXTENDED_FUNCTION_REGISTER_OFF 0x20   /* |0|000|1001 4 lines mode */
00077 #define KS0073_4LINES_MODE                    0x09   /* |0|001|0000 4-bit mode, extension-bit RE = 0 */

00095 /*************************************************************************
00096  delay loop for small accurate delays: 16-bit counter, 4 cycles/loop
00097 *************************************************************************/
00098 static inline void _delayFourCycles(unsigned int __count)
00099 {
00100     if ( __count == 0 )    
00101         __asm__ __volatile__( "rjmp 1f\n 1:" );    // 2 cycles
00102     else
00103         __asm__ __volatile__ (
00104             "1: sbiw %0,1" "\n\t"                  
00105             "brne 1b"                              // 4 cycles/loop
00106             : "=w" (__count)
00107             : "0" (__count)
00108            );
00109 }
00110 
00111 
00112 /************************************************************************* 
00113 delay for a minimum of <us> microseconds
00114 the number of loops is calculated at compile-time from MCU clock frequency
00115 *************************************************************************/
00116 #if 0
00117 #define delay(us)  _delayFourCycles( ( ( 1*(XTAL/4000) )*us)/1000 )
00118 #endif
00119 void delay(double us)
00120 {
00121     if (us < 1000)
00122     {
00123         _delay_us(us);
00124     }
00125     else
00126     {
00127         us = us/1000.0;
00128         _delay_ms(us);
00129     }
00130 }

00133 #if LCD_IO_MODE
00134 /* toggle Enable Pin to initiate write */
00135 static void toggle_e(void)
00136 {
00137     lcd_e_high();
00138     lcd_e_delay();
00139     lcd_e_low();
00140 }
00141 #endif

00143 
00144 /*************************************************************************
00145 Low-level function to write byte to LCD controller
00146 Input:    data   byte to write to LCD
00147           rs     1: write data    
00148                  0: write instruction
00149 Returns:  none
00150 *************************************************************************/
00151 #if LCD_IO_MODE
00152 static void lcd_write(uint8_t data,uint8_t rs) 
00153 {
00154     unsigned char dataBits ;
00155 
00156 
00157     if (rs) {   /* write data        (RS=1, RW=0) */
00158        lcd_rs_high();
00159     } else {    /* write instruction (RS=0, RW=0) */
00160        lcd_rs_low();
00161     }
00162     lcd_rw_low();
00163 
00164     if ( ( &LCD_DATA0_PORT == &LCD_DATA1_PORT) && ( &LCD_DATA1_PORT == &LCD_DATA2_PORT ) && ( &LCD_DATA2_PORT == &LCD_DATA3_PORT )
00165       && (LCD_DATA0_PIN == 0) && (LCD_DATA1_PIN == 1) && (LCD_DATA2_PIN == 2) && (LCD_DATA3_PIN == 3) )
00166     {
00167         /* configure data pins as output */
00168         DDR(LCD_DATA0_PORT) |= 0x0F;
00169 
00170         /* output high nibble first */
00171         dataBits = LCD_DATA0_PORT & 0xF0;
00172         LCD_DATA0_PORT = dataBits |((data>>4)&0x0F);
00173         lcd_e_toggle();
00174 
00175         /* output low nibble */
00176         LCD_DATA0_PORT = dataBits | (data&0x0F);
00177         lcd_e_toggle();
00178 
00179         /* all data pins high (inactive) */
00180         LCD_DATA0_PORT = dataBits | 0x0F;
00181     }
00182     else
00183     {
00184         /* configure data pins as output */
00185         DDR(LCD_DATA0_PORT) |= _BV(LCD_DATA0_PIN);
00186         DDR(LCD_DATA1_PORT) |= _BV(LCD_DATA1_PIN);
00187         DDR(LCD_DATA2_PORT) |= _BV(LCD_DATA2_PIN);
00188         DDR(LCD_DATA3_PORT) |= _BV(LCD_DATA3_PIN);
00189         
00190         /* output high nibble first */
00191         LCD_DATA3_PORT &= ~_BV(LCD_DATA3_PIN);
00192         LCD_DATA2_PORT &= ~_BV(LCD_DATA2_PIN);
00193         LCD_DATA1_PORT &= ~_BV(LCD_DATA1_PIN);
00194         LCD_DATA0_PORT &= ~_BV(LCD_DATA0_PIN);
00195         if(data & 0x80) LCD_DATA3_PORT |= _BV(LCD_DATA3_PIN);
00196         if(data & 0x40) LCD_DATA2_PORT |= _BV(LCD_DATA2_PIN);
00197         if(data & 0x20) LCD_DATA1_PORT |= _BV(LCD_DATA1_PIN);
00198         if(data & 0x10) LCD_DATA0_PORT |= _BV(LCD_DATA0_PIN);   
00199         lcd_e_toggle();
00200         
00201         /* output low nibble */
00202         LCD_DATA3_PORT &= ~_BV(LCD_DATA3_PIN);
00203         LCD_DATA2_PORT &= ~_BV(LCD_DATA2_PIN);
00204         LCD_DATA1_PORT &= ~_BV(LCD_DATA1_PIN);
00205         LCD_DATA0_PORT &= ~_BV(LCD_DATA0_PIN);
00206         if(data & 0x08) LCD_DATA3_PORT |= _BV(LCD_DATA3_PIN);
00207         if(data & 0x04) LCD_DATA2_PORT |= _BV(LCD_DATA2_PIN);
00208         if(data & 0x02) LCD_DATA1_PORT |= _BV(LCD_DATA1_PIN);
00209         if(data & 0x01) LCD_DATA0_PORT |= _BV(LCD_DATA0_PIN);
00210         lcd_e_toggle();        
00211         
00212         /* all data pins high (inactive) */
00213         LCD_DATA0_PORT |= _BV(LCD_DATA0_PIN);
00214         LCD_DATA1_PORT |= _BV(LCD_DATA1_PIN);
00215         LCD_DATA2_PORT |= _BV(LCD_DATA2_PIN);
00216         LCD_DATA3_PORT |= _BV(LCD_DATA3_PIN);
00217     }
00218 }
00219 #else
00220 #define lcd_write(d,rs) if (rs) *(volatile uint8_t*)(LCD_IO_DATA) = d; else *(volatile uint8_t*)(LCD_IO_FUNCTION) = d;
00221 /* rs==0 -> write instruction to LCD_IO_FUNCTION */
00222 /* rs==1 -> write data to LCD_IO_DATA */
00223 #endif
00224 
00225 
00226 /*************************************************************************
00227 Low-level function to read byte from LCD controller
00228 Input:    rs     1: read data    
00229                  0: read busy flag / address counter
00230 Returns:  byte read from LCD controller
00231 *************************************************************************/
00232 #if LCD_IO_MODE
00233 static uint8_t lcd_read(uint8_t rs) 
00234 {
00235     uint8_t data;
00236     
00237     
00238     if (rs)
00239         lcd_rs_high();                       /* RS=1: read data      */
00240     else
00241         lcd_rs_low();                        /* RS=0: read busy flag */
00242     lcd_rw_high();                           /* RW=1  read mode      */
00243     
00244     if ( ( &LCD_DATA0_PORT == &LCD_DATA1_PORT) && ( &LCD_DATA1_PORT == &LCD_DATA2_PORT ) && ( &LCD_DATA2_PORT == &LCD_DATA3_PORT )
00245       && ( LCD_DATA0_PIN == 0 )&& (LCD_DATA1_PIN == 1) && (LCD_DATA2_PIN == 2) && (LCD_DATA3_PIN == 3) )
00246     {
00247         DDR(LCD_DATA0_PORT) &= 0xF0;         /* configure data pins as input */
00248         
00249         lcd_e_high();
00250         lcd_e_delay();        
00251         data = PIN(LCD_DATA0_PORT) << 4;     /* read high nibble first */
00252         lcd_e_low();
00253         
00254         lcd_e_delay();                       /* Enable 500ns low       */
00255         
00256         lcd_e_high();
00257         lcd_e_delay();
00258         data |= PIN(LCD_DATA0_PORT)&0x0F;    /* read low nibble        */
00259         lcd_e_low();
00260     }
00261     else
00262     {
00263         /* configure data pins as input */
00264         DDR(LCD_DATA0_PORT) &= ~_BV(LCD_DATA0_PIN);
00265         DDR(LCD_DATA1_PORT) &= ~_BV(LCD_DATA1_PIN);
00266         DDR(LCD_DATA2_PORT) &= ~_BV(LCD_DATA2_PIN);
00267         DDR(LCD_DATA3_PORT) &= ~_BV(LCD_DATA3_PIN);
00268                 
00269         /* read high nibble first */
00270         lcd_e_high();
00271         lcd_e_delay();        
00272         data = 0;
00273         if ( PIN(LCD_DATA0_PORT) & _BV(LCD_DATA0_PIN) ) data |= 0x10;
00274         if ( PIN(LCD_DATA1_PORT) & _BV(LCD_DATA1_PIN) ) data |= 0x20;
00275         if ( PIN(LCD_DATA2_PORT) & _BV(LCD_DATA2_PIN) ) data |= 0x40;
00276         if ( PIN(LCD_DATA3_PORT) & _BV(LCD_DATA3_PIN) ) data |= 0x80;
00277         lcd_e_low();
00278 
00279         lcd_e_delay();                       /* Enable 500ns low       */
00280     
00281         /* read low nibble */    
00282         lcd_e_high();
00283         lcd_e_delay();
00284         if ( PIN(LCD_DATA0_PORT) & _BV(LCD_DATA0_PIN) ) data |= 0x01;
00285         if ( PIN(LCD_DATA1_PORT) & _BV(LCD_DATA1_PIN) ) data |= 0x02;
00286         if ( PIN(LCD_DATA2_PORT) & _BV(LCD_DATA2_PIN) ) data |= 0x04;
00287         if ( PIN(LCD_DATA3_PORT) & _BV(LCD_DATA3_PIN) ) data |= 0x08;        
00288         lcd_e_low();
00289     }
00290     return data;
00291 }
00292 #else
00293 #define lcd_read(rs) (rs) ? *(volatile uint8_t*)(LCD_IO_DATA+LCD_IO_READ) : *(volatile uint8_t*)(LCD_IO_FUNCTION+LCD_IO_READ)
00294 /* rs==0 -> read instruction from LCD_IO_FUNCTION */
00295 /* rs==1 -> read data from LCD_IO_DATA */
00296 #endif
00297 
00298 
00299 /*************************************************************************
00300 loops while lcd is busy, returns address counter
00301 *************************************************************************/
00302 static uint8_t lcd_waitbusy(void)
00303 
00304 {
00305     register uint8_t c;
00306     
00307     /* wait until busy flag is cleared */
00308     while ( (c=lcd_read(0)) & (1<<LCD_BUSY)) {}
00309     
00310     /* the address counter is updated 4us after the busy flag is cleared */
00311     delay(2);
00312 
00313     /* now read the address counter */
00314     return (lcd_read(0));  // return address counter
00315     
00316 }/* lcd_waitbusy */
00317 
00318 
00319 /*************************************************************************
00320 Move cursor to the start of next line or to the first line if the cursor 
00321 is already on the last line.
00322 *************************************************************************/
00323 static inline void lcd_newline(uint8_t pos)
00324 {
00325     register uint8_t addressCounter;
00326 
00327 
00328 #if LCD_LINES==1
00329     addressCounter = 0;
00330 #endif
00331 #if LCD_LINES==2
00332     if ( pos < (LCD_START_LINE2) )
00333         addressCounter = LCD_START_LINE2;
00334     else
00335         addressCounter = LCD_START_LINE1;
00336 #endif
00337 #if LCD_LINES==4
00338 #if KS0073_4LINES_MODE
00339     if ( pos < LCD_START_LINE2 )
00340         addressCounter = LCD_START_LINE2;
00341     else if ( (pos >= LCD_START_LINE2) && (pos < LCD_START_LINE3) )
00342         addressCounter = LCD_START_LINE3;
00343     else if ( (pos >= LCD_START_LINE3) && (pos < LCD_START_LINE4) )
00344         addressCounter = LCD_START_LINE4;
00345     else 
00346         addressCounter = LCD_START_LINE1;
00347 #else
00348     if ( pos < LCD_START_LINE3 )
00349         addressCounter = LCD_START_LINE2;
00350     else if ( (pos >= LCD_START_LINE2) && (pos < LCD_START_LINE4) )
00351         addressCounter = LCD_START_LINE3;
00352     else if ( (pos >= LCD_START_LINE3) && (pos < LCD_START_LINE2) )
00353         addressCounter = LCD_START_LINE4;
00354     else 
00355         addressCounter = LCD_START_LINE1;
00356 #endif
00357 #endif
00358     lcd_command((1<<LCD_DDRAM)+addressCounter);
00359 
00360 }/* lcd_newline */

00364 ** PUBLIC FUNCTIONS

00367 /*************************************************************************
00368 Send LCD controller instruction command
00369 Input:   instruction to send to LCD controller, see HD44780 data sheet
00370 Returns: none
00371 *************************************************************************/
00372 void lcd_command(uint8_t cmd)
00373 {
00374     lcd_waitbusy();
00375     lcd_write(cmd,0);
00376 }
00377 
00378 
00379 /*************************************************************************
00380 Send data byte to LCD controller 
00381 Input:   data to send to LCD controller, see HD44780 data sheet
00382 Returns: none
00383 *************************************************************************/
00384 void lcd_data(uint8_t data)
00385 {
00386     lcd_waitbusy();
00387     lcd_write(data,1);
00388 }
00389 
00390 
00391 
00392 /*************************************************************************
00393 Set cursor to specified position
00394 Input:    x  horizontal position  (0: left most position)
00395           y  vertical position    (0: first line)
00396 Returns:  none
00397 *************************************************************************/
00398 void lcd_gotoxy(uint8_t x, uint8_t y)
00399 {
00400 #if LCD_LINES==1
00401     lcd_command((1<<LCD_DDRAM)+LCD_START_LINE1+x);
00402 #endif
00403 #if LCD_LINES==2
00404     if ( y==0 ) 
00405         lcd_command((1<<LCD_DDRAM)+LCD_START_LINE1+x);
00406     else
00407         lcd_command((1<<LCD_DDRAM)+LCD_START_LINE2+x);
00408 #endif
00409 #if LCD_LINES==4
00410     if ( y==0 )
00411         lcd_command((1<<LCD_DDRAM)+LCD_START_LINE1+x);
00412     else if ( y==1)
00413         lcd_command((1<<LCD_DDRAM)+LCD_START_LINE2+x);
00414     else if ( y==2)
00415         lcd_command((1<<LCD_DDRAM)+LCD_START_LINE3+x);
00416     else /* y==3 */
00417         lcd_command((1<<LCD_DDRAM)+LCD_START_LINE4+x);
00418 #endif
00419 
00420 }/* lcd_gotoxy */
00421 
00422 
00423 /*************************************************************************
00424 *************************************************************************/
00425 int lcd_getxy(void)
00426 {
00427     return lcd_waitbusy();
00428 }
00429

00431 /*************************************************************************
00432 Clear display and set cursor to home position
00433 *************************************************************************/
00434 void lcd_clrscr(void)
00435 {
00436     lcd_command(1<<LCD_CLR);
00437 }

00440 /*************************************************************************
00441 Set cursor to home position
00442 *************************************************************************/
00443 void lcd_home(void)
00444 {
00445     lcd_command(1<<LCD_HOME);
00446 }

00448 
00449 /*************************************************************************
00450 Display character at current cursor position 
00451 Input:    character to be displayed                                       
00452 Returns:  none
00453 *************************************************************************/
00454 void lcd_putc(char c)
00455 {
00456     uint8_t pos;
00457 
00458 
00459     pos = lcd_waitbusy();   // read busy-flag and address counter
00460     if (c=='\n')
00461     {
00462         lcd_newline(pos);
00463     }
00464     else
00465     {
00466 #if LCD_WRAP_LINES==1
00467 #if LCD_LINES==1
00468         if ( pos == LCD_START_LINE1+LCD_DISP_LENGTH ) {
00469             lcd_write((1<<LCD_DDRAM)+LCD_START_LINE1,0);
00470         }
00471 #elif LCD_LINES==2
00472         if ( pos == LCD_START_LINE1+LCD_DISP_LENGTH ) {
00473             lcd_write((1<<LCD_DDRAM)+LCD_START_LINE2,0);    
00474         }else if ( pos == LCD_START_LINE2+LCD_DISP_LENGTH ){
00475             lcd_write((1<<LCD_DDRAM)+LCD_START_LINE1,0);
00476         }
00477 #elif LCD_LINES==4
00478         if ( pos == LCD_START_LINE1+LCD_DISP_LENGTH ) {
00479             lcd_write((1<<LCD_DDRAM)+LCD_START_LINE2,0);    
00480         }else if ( pos == LCD_START_LINE2+LCD_DISP_LENGTH ) {
00481             lcd_write((1<<LCD_DDRAM)+LCD_START_LINE3,0);
00482         }else if ( pos == LCD_START_LINE3+LCD_DISP_LENGTH ) {
00483             lcd_write((1<<LCD_DDRAM)+LCD_START_LINE4,0);
00484         }else if ( pos == LCD_START_LINE4+LCD_DISP_LENGTH ) {
00485             lcd_write((1<<LCD_DDRAM)+LCD_START_LINE1,0);
00486         }
00487 #endif
00488         lcd_waitbusy();
00489 #endif
00490         lcd_write(c, 1);
00491     }
00492 
00493 }/* lcd_putc */
00494 
00495 
00496 /*************************************************************************
00497 Display string without auto linefeed 
00498 Input:    string to be displayed
00499 Returns:  none
00500 *************************************************************************/
00501 void lcd_puts(const char *s)
00502 /* print string on lcd (no auto linefeed) */
00503 {
00504     register char c;
00505 
00506     while ( (c = *s++) ) {
00507         lcd_putc(c);
00508     }
00509 
00510 }/* lcd_puts */
00511 
00512 
00513 /*************************************************************************
00514 Display string from program memory without auto linefeed 
00515 Input:     string from program memory be be displayed                                        
00516 Returns:   none
00517 *************************************************************************/
00518 void lcd_puts_p(const char *progmem_s)
00519 /* print string from program memory on lcd (no auto linefeed) */
00520 {
00521     register char c;
00522 
00523     while ( (c = pgm_read_byte(progmem_s++)) ) {
00524         lcd_putc(c);
00525     }
00526 
00527 }/* lcd_puts_p */
00528 
00529 
00530 /*************************************************************************
00531 Initialize display and select type of cursor 
00532 Input:    dispAttr LCD_DISP_OFF            display off
00533                    LCD_DISP_ON             display on, cursor off
00534                    LCD_DISP_ON_CURSOR      display on, cursor on
00535                    LCD_DISP_CURSOR_BLINK   display on, cursor on flashing
00536 Returns:  none
00537 *************************************************************************/
00538 void lcd_init(uint8_t dispAttr)
00539 {
00540 #if LCD_IO_MODE
00541     /*
00542      *  Initialize LCD to 4 bit I/O mode
00543      */
00544      
00545     if ( ( &LCD_DATA0_PORT == &LCD_DATA1_PORT) && ( &LCD_DATA1_PORT == &LCD_DATA2_PORT ) && ( &LCD_DATA2_PORT == &LCD_DATA3_PORT )
00546       && ( &LCD_RS_PORT == &LCD_DATA0_PORT) && ( &LCD_RW_PORT == &LCD_DATA0_PORT) && (&LCD_E_PORT == &LCD_DATA0_PORT)
00547       && (LCD_DATA0_PIN == 0 ) && (LCD_DATA1_PIN == 1) && (LCD_DATA2_PIN == 2) && (LCD_DATA3_PIN == 3) 
00548       && (LCD_RS_PIN == 4 ) && (LCD_RW_PIN == 5) && (LCD_E_PIN == 6 ) )
00549     {
00550         /* configure all port bits as output (all LCD lines on same port) */
00551         DDR(LCD_DATA0_PORT) |= 0x7F;
00552     }
00553     else if ( ( &LCD_DATA0_PORT == &LCD_DATA1_PORT) && ( &LCD_DATA1_PORT == &LCD_DATA2_PORT ) && ( &LCD_DATA2_PORT == &LCD_DATA3_PORT )
00554            && (LCD_DATA0_PIN == 0 ) && (LCD_DATA1_PIN == 1) && (LCD_DATA2_PIN == 2) && (LCD_DATA3_PIN == 3) )
00555     {
00556         /* configure all port bits as output (all LCD data lines on same port, but control lines on different ports) */
00557         DDR(LCD_DATA0_PORT) |= 0x0F;
00558         DDR(LCD_RS_PORT)    |= _BV(LCD_RS_PIN);
00559         DDR(LCD_RW_PORT)    |= _BV(LCD_RW_PIN);
00560         DDR(LCD_E_PORT)     |= _BV(LCD_E_PIN);
00561     }
00562     else
00563     {
00564         /* configure all port bits as output (LCD data and control lines on different ports */
00565         DDR(LCD_RS_PORT)    |= _BV(LCD_RS_PIN);
00566         DDR(LCD_RW_PORT)    |= _BV(LCD_RW_PIN);
00567         DDR(LCD_E_PORT)     |= _BV(LCD_E_PIN);
00568         DDR(LCD_DATA0_PORT) |= _BV(LCD_DATA0_PIN);
00569         DDR(LCD_DATA1_PORT) |= _BV(LCD_DATA1_PIN);
00570         DDR(LCD_DATA2_PORT) |= _BV(LCD_DATA2_PIN);
00571         DDR(LCD_DATA3_PORT) |= _BV(LCD_DATA3_PIN);
00572     }
00573     delay(16000);        /* wait 16ms or more after power-on       */
00574     
00575     /* initial write to lcd is 8bit */
00576     LCD_DATA1_PORT |= _BV(LCD_DATA1_PIN);  // _BV(LCD_FUNCTION)>>4;
00577     LCD_DATA0_PORT |= _BV(LCD_DATA0_PIN);  // _BV(LCD_FUNCTION_8BIT)>>4;
00578     lcd_e_toggle();
00579     delay(4992);         /* delay, busy flag can't be checked here */
00580    
00581     /* repeat last command */ 
00582     lcd_e_toggle();      
00583     delay(64);           /* delay, busy flag can't be checked here */
00584     
00585     /* repeat last command a third time */
00586     lcd_e_toggle();      
00587     delay(64);           /* delay, busy flag can't be checked here */
00588 
00589     /* now configure for 4bit mode */
00590     LCD_DATA0_PORT &= ~_BV(LCD_DATA0_PIN);   // LCD_FUNCTION_4BIT_1LINE>>4
00591     lcd_e_toggle();
00592     delay(64);           /* some displays need this additional delay */
00593     
00594     /* from now the LCD only accepts 4 bit I/O, we can use lcd_command() */    
00595 #else
00596     /*
00597      * Initialize LCD to 8 bit memory mapped mode
00598      */
00599     
00600     /* enable external SRAM (memory mapped lcd) and one wait state */        
00601     MCUCR = _BV(SRE) | _BV(SRW);
00602 
00603     /* reset LCD */
00604     delay(16000);                           /* wait 16ms after power-on     */
00605     lcd_write(LCD_FUNCTION_8BIT_1LINE,0);   /* function set: 8bit interface */                   
00606     delay(4992);                            /* wait 5ms                     */
00607     lcd_write(LCD_FUNCTION_8BIT_1LINE,0);   /* function set: 8bit interface */                 
00608     delay(64);                              /* wait 64us                    */
00609     lcd_write(LCD_FUNCTION_8BIT_1LINE,0);   /* function set: 8bit interface */                
00610     delay(64);                              /* wait 64us                    */
00611 #endif
00612 
00613 #if KS0073_4LINES_MODE
00614     /* Display with KS0073 controller requires special commands for enabling 4 line mode */
00615     lcd_command(KS0073_EXTENDED_FUNCTION_REGISTER_ON);
00616     lcd_command(KS0073_4LINES_MODE);
00617     lcd_command(KS0073_EXTENDED_FUNCTION_REGISTER_OFF);
00618 #else
00619     lcd_command(LCD_FUNCTION_DEFAULT);      /* function set: display lines  */
00620 #endif
00621     lcd_command(LCD_DISP_OFF);              /* display off                  */
00622     lcd_clrscr();                           /* display clear                */ 
00623     lcd_command(LCD_MODE_DEFAULT);          /* set entry mode               */
00624     lcd_command(dispAttr);                  /* display/cursor control       */
00625 
00626 }/* lcd_init */
